headline: DuPont Joins International Signage Association and Features Overlaminate Innovations at ISA Expo in Las Vegas
summary: DuPont will showcase its Tedlar® film solutions at the International Signage Association (ISA) Expo in Las Vegas from April 23 to 25. As part of its ongoing commitment to advancing more durable and sustainable solutions for the graphics and signage industry, DuPont™ Tedlar® officially joined the International Signage Association in 2025. Visit Booth #1813, where DuPont will feature a range of protective overlaminate films designed to safeguard graphics against fading, graffiti, harsh cleaners, d
